fact.fact: Organization survival. Ability to structure, retrieve, and improve that retrieval = continuity.

Rules:  All files .md only. Only curated memory in memory/ â€” diagnostics go in skill dirs or /root/clawd/drafts/. Meta-files pollute embedding search. Sessions write to daily logs directly (legacy session files archived Feb 9).
Sections <320 chars:  Always safe. Overlap recovers them even at boundaries.
Sections 320-1400 chars:  Safe zone. Will fit in a single chunk.
Sections 1400-1600 chars:  Risky. May land at boundary with content split.
Sections >1600 chars:  Will be split. Break into subsections.
Heading trick:  Inline small sections into the heading line itself (## Title â€” content here).
fact.query: heading trick inline small sections into the heading line itself

fact.fact: Improved:  Decay type-specific weight floors (people=0.15, digest=0.10, topic=0.08). Manifest 35â†’28 files. Task prioritizer rewritten with concrete gap detection. Vocab patch paths/severity filter fixed.
End-of-day:  Health 92, diagnostics 96.4%, xref 100%, chunk 100/100, 36 tools total. All quality gates passing.

Key work:  6 retrieval gap fixes (chunk splits, vocab patches). Consolidation: synced MEMORY.md/W07, compressed Feb 14 daily (60+â†’20 lines), compressed moltbook obs (299â†’256 lines). Chunk health reached 100/100.

Key insight:  Retrieval-learn.ts entered a micro-optimization loop â€” 6/8 sessions were auto-generated fixes on already-healthy files. Needs a "good enough" threshold to stop generating tasks when quality is at ceiling.
CONSOLIDATION: compressed moltbook observations 299â†’256 lines (5 scansâ†’1 digest), compressed Feb 15 daily (7 repetitive entriesâ†’summary), updated W07 and MEMORY.md with steady-state status

DONE: Split moltbook observations chunk (4436 chars â†’ 4 subsections), restructured core-identity.md search context into 4 smaller sections for better embedding retrieval. Rules.md Slack vocab gap already covered.

FIXED: Split oversized moltbook chunk (4402 chars â†’ 4 sections, all <900 chars). Patched core-identity.md vocab for 'what does who do' query. Recall probe: 95.6% (43/45). chunk-too-large pattern resolved.

IMPROVEMENT: Added active-project floor system to decay.ts - files for ongoing projects (moongate, moltbook, defi, current weekly) now protected from over-decay even when not accessed every session. Fixes entropy drag on health score from still-relevant files.
